Documentation link: Структура JSON – Договор
Create Custom Document

Either sign or dataJson must be provided. If both are provided, sign will be used.
If sign is provided, the document will be created using the signed data.
If dataJson is provided, the document will be saved using the provided JSON data.
The file parameter is required and should be .pdf or .docx.
